import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../Styles/Filt.css' import '../Styles/Deta.css' import '../Styles/Filter.css' import queryString from 'query-string'; // Class Component class Filter extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { restaurantData: [], locationValues: [] } } componentDidMount() { const qs = queryString.parse(this.props.location.search); const restaurantId = qs.restaurant; axios( { method: 'GET', url: 'http://localhost:3000/city/getcitylist', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } } ).then(response => this.setState({ locationValues: response.data })).catch() axios( { method: 'GET', url: 'http://localhost:3000/restaurant/getAllResturants', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } } ).then(response => this.setState({ restaurantData: response.data })).catch() } handleLocationChange = () => { } render() { const { restaurantData, locationValues } = this.state; return (
e!
{/* Filter Section */}

Cuisines
Cost For Two
Sort
{restaurantData && restaurantData.map((item) => { return
{item.name}
{item.address}
{item.locality}, {item.city}
CUISINES:
COST FOR TWO:
{item.cuisine}
{item.min_price}
})}
); } } export default Filter;
